mapper.select: select rname, address, rnumber, openhours, menu, thumbimage, replycnt from tbl_rest order by bno asc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_rest (bno, rname, content, location, address, rnumber, url, openhours, menu, lat, rlong, image, thumbimage) values (seq_rest_bno.nextval, #{rname}, #{content}, #{location}, #{address}, #{rnumber}, #{url}, #{openhours}, #{menu}, #{lat}, #{rlong}, #{image}, #{thumbimage})
